title: Unspecified Error/Client Opens and then Closes? [Mac User]
body:
;-; I cant even open the actual application, Before that I kept getting unspecified error check logs for details etc, so I uninstalled and re-installed and still having problems .
 The logo just appears when I click it, then the wheel of doom comes [Im using Mac Air] for like 3 seconds and then it closes and does the same thing when I open it again. 

**Heres what ive done:
**
I've re-installed 3 times
I've cleared some files from my laptop
I've also emptied/deleted the logs for the Lol patch [Would that be the problem? Because it wasnt working even when the logs where still there]
My internet has been restarted and rebooted, I have perfectly fine connection
I've restarted my laptop.

{{champion:103}} {{item:3070}} 

Pls hulp me i really wanna play.

**IT WAS WORKING PERFECTLY FINE YESTERDAY WHICH WAS THE LAST TIME I USED IT**

replies.body: It's happening for all Mac Users.
